tasks.title: Setup Project Infrastructure
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository, configure hosting environment with Cloudflare CDN, and set up SSL certificate for security.
tasks.details:
1. Create a new Git repository
2. Configure premium shared hosting account
3. Set up Cloudflare CDN integration
4. Install and configure SSL certificate
5. Implement daily automated backup system
6. Configure uptime monitoring and performance alerts
7. Set up development, staging, and production environments
8. Document infrastructure setup for team reference
tasks.testStrategy: Verify SSL certificate installation with SSL checker tools. Test CDN functionality by measuring load times from different geographic locations. Confirm backup system by performing a test restoration. Validate uptime monitoring by simulating downtime scenarios.

subtasks.title: Create and Configure Git Repository
subtasks.description: Initialize a new Git repository for the project, set up branch protection rules, and configure collaboration settings.
subtasks.details:
1. Create new repository on GitHub/GitLab/Bitbucket
2. Initialize local repository
3. Set up main/development branches
4. Configure branch protection rules
5. Add .gitignore and README.md files
6. Set up commit templates
7. Configure repository access for team members

subtasks.title: Configure Premium Shared Hosting Environment
subtasks.description: Set up and configure the premium shared hosting account with appropriate server settings and access controls.
subtasks.details:
1. Purchase premium shared hosting plan
2. Set up hosting account credentials
3. Configure PHP version and settings
4. Set up FTP/SFTP access
5. Configure server-side caching
6. Set up email accounts if needed
7. Configure file permissions
8. Test hosting environment performance

subtasks.title: Implement Cloudflare CDN Integration
subtasks.description: Set up and configure Cloudflare CDN to improve website performance, security, and availability.
subtasks.details:
1. Create Cloudflare account
2. Add domain to Cloudflare
3. Update DNS settings
4. Configure CDN caching rules
5. Set up page rules for specific paths
6. Enable minification for CSS/JS/HTML
7. Configure Cloudflare firewall settings
8. Test CDN performance from multiple locations

subtasks.title: Install and Configure SSL Certificate
subtasks.description: Obtain, install, and configure an SSL certificate to ensure secure HTTPS connections to the website.
subtasks.details:
1. Generate CSR (Certificate Signing Request)
2. Purchase or obtain free SSL certificate (Let's Encrypt)
3. Install certificate on hosting server
4. Configure web server for HTTPS
5. Set up HTTPS redirects
6. Implement HSTS headers
7. Test SSL configuration with security tools
8. Set up certificate auto-renewal

subtasks.title: Implement Automated Backup System
subtasks.description: Set up a daily automated backup system for website files and databases with secure offsite storage.
subtasks.details:
1. Select backup solution (hosting provided or third-party)
2. Configure daily backup schedule
3. Set up database backup procedures
4. Configure file backup procedures
5. Set up offsite backup storage
6. Implement backup rotation policy
7. Create backup restoration procedure
8. Test backup and restoration process

subtasks.title: Configure Monitoring and Performance Alerts
subtasks.description: Set up uptime monitoring, performance tracking, and alert systems to ensure site reliability.
subtasks.details:
1. Select monitoring service (UptimeRobot, Pingdom, etc.)
2. Configure uptime checks for all environments
3. Set up performance monitoring
4. Configure alert thresholds
5. Set up notification channels (email, SMS, Slack)
6. Implement server resource monitoring
7. Configure error logging and tracking
8. Test alert system with simulated downtime

subtasks.title: Set Up Development, Staging, and Production Environments
subtasks.description: Create and configure separate environments for development, staging, and production with appropriate deployment workflows.
subtasks.details:
1. Create development environment
2. Set up staging environment
3. Configure production environment
4. Implement environment-specific configurations
5. Set up deployment pipelines
6. Configure environment variables for each environment
7. Implement database synchronization between environments
8. Test deployment workflows across all environments

subtasks.title: Create Infrastructure Documentation
subtasks.description: Document all aspects of the infrastructure setup for team reference and future maintenance.
subtasks.details:
1. Document repository structure and branching strategy
2. Create hosting environment documentation
3. Document CDN configuration and settings
4. Create SSL certificate management guide
5. Document backup procedures and restoration steps
6. Create monitoring system documentation
7. Document environment setup and deployment workflows
8. Compile all documentation in central team wiki/repository

tasks.title: Implement Basic HTML Structure and Responsive Framework
tasks.description: Create the foundational HTML structure and implement a responsive CSS framework to ensure mobile compatibility from the start.
tasks.details:
1. Set up HTML5 boilerplate with proper document structure
2. Implement responsive CSS framework (custom or existing framework)
3. Create mobile-first breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
4. Implement dark theme with bold typography as specified
5. Set up CSS architecture (BEM methodology recommended)
6. Create base components (buttons, forms, typography)
7. Ensure high contrast for accessibility
8. Implement keyboard navigation support
9. Test screen reader compatibility
tasks.testStrategy: Test responsiveness across multiple devices and screen sizes. Validate HTML against W3C standards. Verify accessibility using WAVE or similar tools to ensure WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Test keyboard navigation functionality.

tasks.title: Develop Hero Section with Booking CTA
tasks.description: Create a full-screen hero section with DJ branding, tagline, and a prominent 'Book Your Event' call-to-action button.
tasks.details:
1. Design full-screen hero section with background image/video
2. Implement DJ branding elements and tagline
3. Create prominent 'Book Your Event' CTA button
4. Ensure text is legible over background
5. Optimize for mobile viewing with appropriate sizing
6. Implement smooth scrolling to booking form when CTA is clicked
7. Add subtle animations for visual engagement
8. Ensure loading time is under 3 seconds
tasks.testStrategy: Test CTA button functionality across devices. Measure load time performance. Verify visual appearance across different screen sizes. Conduct A/B testing with different CTA placements to optimize conversion rate.

tasks.title: Implement Backend Server with Node.js/Express
tasks.description: Set up the Node.js/Express backend server for form processing, content management, and API integrations.
tasks.details:
1. Initialize Node.js project with npm
2. Install Express.js framework
3. Set up project structure (routes, controllers, models, etc.)
4. Implement basic API endpoints for form submission
5. Configure middleware for security, logging, and error handling
6. Set up environment variables for configuration
7. Implement CORS protection
8. Create documentation for API endpoints
9. Set up testing framework for backend
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for API endpoints using Jest or Mocha. Test form submission with various inputs. Verify error handling and response formats. Load test the server to ensure it can handle expected traffic.

tasks.title: Configure MongoDB Database and Data Models
tasks.description: Set up MongoDB database and implement the required data models for booking requests, music catalog, and gallery items.
tasks.details:
1. Set up MongoDB Atlas cluster or local MongoDB instance
2. Create database schemas for the three data models:
   - Booking Requests: clientInfo, eventDetails, requirements, status
   - Music Catalog: mixId, title, genre, duration, audioUrl, uploadDate, playCount, featured
   - Gallery Items: imageId, title, eventType, venue, date, imageUrl, thumbnailUrl, featured
3. Implement Mongoose models and validation
4. Create database connection module
5. Set up indexes for performance optimization
6. Implement CRUD operations for each model
7. Create seed data for development
tasks.testStrategy: Test database connection and CRUD operations for each model. Validate schema constraints with edge case inputs. Verify indexing performance with query analysis. Test data integrity with concurrent operations.

tasks.title: Develop Music Player System
tasks.description: Create an embedded audio player that showcases DJ mixes across multiple genres with filtering capabilities.
tasks.details:
1. Set up AWS S3 bucket for audio file storage
2. Implement audio upload functionality to S3
3. Create responsive audio player UI with custom controls
4. Implement genre filtering (Afrobeats, Hip-Hop, R&B, Old School, Jazz)
5. Add play count tracking functionality
6. Implement progressive loading for mobile optimization
7. Support compressed audio formats for performance
8. Add playlist functionality for continuous playback
9. Implement audio visualization if appropriate
tasks.testStrategy: Test audio playback across different browsers and devices. Verify genre filtering functionality. Test progressive loading on slow connections. Measure loading performance on mobile networks. Verify play count tracking accuracy.

tasks.title: Create Dynamic Photo Gallery
tasks.description: Implement a modern grid layout photo gallery with lightbox functionality, filterable by event type.
tasks.details:
1. Set up AWS S3 bucket for image storage
2. Implement image upload and processing pipeline
3. Create thumbnail generation system for performance
4. Implement lazy loading for gallery images
5. Create modern grid layout with responsive design
6. Add lightbox functionality for image viewing
7. Implement filtering by event type
8. Add image optimization for various screen sizes
9. Implement swipe gestures for mobile browsing
tasks.testStrategy: Test gallery loading performance across devices. Verify lazy loading functionality. Test lightbox on mobile and desktop. Validate filtering functionality. Measure image loading times and optimize if necessary.

tasks.title: Implement Service Showcase with Dropdowns
tasks.description: Create a clear presentation of event types and capabilities with hover-activated dropdown menus.
tasks.details:
1. Design service category structure
2. Implement hover-activated dropdown menus
3. Create visual icons for each service type
4. Write concise service descriptions
5. Ensure mobile compatibility with touch events
6. Add smooth animations for dropdown transitions
7. Implement accessibility features for dropdown navigation
8. Create linkage to booking form with pre-selected service
tasks.testStrategy: Test dropdown functionality across devices. Verify touch events on mobile. Test keyboard accessibility. Verify that service selection properly pre-fills booking form. Test animation performance on lower-end devices.

tasks.title: Develop Online Booking System
tasks.description: Create a multi-step form capturing event details and client information for streamlined lead generation.
tasks.details:
1. Design multi-step form flow
2. Implement progressive form with validation
3. Create sections for event type, date, budget, and special requirements
4. Add client information collection (name, email, phone)
5. Implement form progress indicators
6. Add auto-save functionality to prevent form abandonment
7. Create form submission handler with database storage
8. Implement email notifications via SendGrid API
9. Add form analytics tracking
tasks.testStrategy: Test form submission with various inputs. Verify validation logic for all fields. Test auto-save functionality. Verify email notifications are sent correctly. Test form on mobile devices for usability. Measure form completion rates.

tasks.title: Integrate Google Calendar API for Event Management
tasks.description: Implement calendar integration to display upcoming gigs and availability with past events archive.
tasks.details:
1. Set up Google Calendar API credentials
2. Implement OAuth authentication flow
3. Create calendar widget UI with availability indicators
4. Implement event fetching from Google Calendar
5. Add past events archive functionality
6. Create availability checking for booking system
7. Implement two-way sync for new bookings
8. Add admin interface for calendar management
9. Implement caching for performance
tasks.testStrategy: Test calendar display across devices. Verify event data accuracy. Test availability checking functionality. Verify two-way sync with test events. Measure API performance and optimize if necessary.

tasks.title: Implement Client Testimonials with Animation
tasks.description: Create scrolling testimonials from Nigerian corporate clients and events with animated text effects.
tasks.details:
1. Design testimonial display component
2. Implement animated scrolling text effect
3. Create testimonial data structure in database
4. Add admin interface for testimonial management
5. Implement client logo display alongside testimonials
6. Add controls for pausing/resuming animation
7. Ensure mobile responsiveness
8. Implement performance optimizations for animations
tasks.testStrategy: Test animation performance across devices. Verify testimonial content display. Test controls for pausing/resuming. Measure impact on page performance. Test accessibility of animated content.

tasks.title: Integrate SendGrid API for Email Automation
tasks.description: Implement email automation for booking confirmations and follow-ups using SendGrid API.
tasks.details:
1. Set up SendGrid API credentials
2. Create email templates for booking confirmations
3. Implement email sending functionality
4. Create automated email sequences for follow-ups
5. Add email tracking and analytics
6. Implement email personalization
7. Create admin interface for email template management
8. Set up email scheduling functionality
tasks.testStrategy: Test email delivery to various email providers. Verify personalization functionality. Test email tracking accuracy. Verify template rendering across email clients. Test automated sequences with various triggers.

tasks.title: Implement Analytics and SEO Optimization
tasks.description: Set up Google Analytics for traffic and conversion tracking, and implement SEO best practices.
tasks.details:
1. Set up Google Analytics account and tracking code
2. Implement event tracking for key user interactions
3. Create conversion goals for booking form submissions
4. Implement meta tags for SEO optimization
5. Create XML sitemap
6. Implement schema.org markup for rich snippets
7. Optimize page speed and Core Web Vitals
8. Create analytics dashboard for client
9. Implement local SEO optimizations for NYC market
tasks.testStrategy: Verify analytics tracking with test interactions. Test conversion goal tracking. Validate SEO implementation with tools like Lighthouse and SEMrush. Measure page speed improvements. Test schema markup with Google's Rich Results Test.

tasks.title: Develop Admin Dashboard for Content Management
tasks.description: Create an admin panel for non-technical updates, content management, and booking request handling.
tasks.details:
1. Design admin dashboard UI
2. Implement secure authentication system
3. Create content management interfaces for:
   - Music uploads and management
   - Gallery image uploads and management
   - Testimonial management
   - Service information updates
4. Implement booking request management system
5. Add analytics display in dashboard
6. Create user management for multiple admin levels
7. Implement activity logging for security
8. Add content preview functionality
tasks.testStrategy: Test admin authentication security. Verify all CRUD operations for content management. Test booking management workflow. Verify permissions for different admin levels. Test content preview functionality across devices.

tasks.title: Implement Social Media Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Instagram API for social media feed display and implement social sharing functionality.
tasks.details:
1. Set up Instagram API credentials
2. Implement OAuth authentication flow
3. Create social media feed display component
4. Add caching for API responses
5. Implement social sharing buttons for content
6. Create fallback for API rate limiting
7. Add auto-refresh functionality for feed
8. Implement lazy loading for social media content
9. Add analytics tracking for social interactions
